    • Field Detail

      • UPGRADETIME

        public static final float UPGRADETIME
        How many days it takes to upgrade per full level (100XP). The official rules say one week per character level. However, Javelin's goal is to advance to level 20 in the span of a year. This may need to be adjusted to balance fun to play (faster) and the overarching design (slower). Currently, it's jusst a median between the tow.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • trained

        public final Combatant trained
        The upgraded unit.

      • xpcost

        public final float xpcost
        Cost in challenge rating.

      • equipment

        public final java.util.ArrayList<Item> equipment
        Upgraded unit's equipment. See Squad.equipment;

      • untrained

        public Combatant untrained
        The non-upgraded creature in case this needs to be canceled.
